DOC.brief_summary: Fat tissue from omenta, thigh and abdomen taken under anesthesia on subjects undergoing laparoscopic surgery, cholecystectomy, reflux surgery or gastric by-pass (GBP). Are there any difference in polymorphids and/or mRNA expression in genes significant for developing obesity, between normal weight and obese individuals, with or without diabetes typ 2 . Are there any difference in polymorphids and/or mRNA expression in different types of fat tissue
DOC.brief_title: Polymorphids an mRNA Expression in Obese Genes
DOC.criteria: age 18 years or older laparoscopic surgery (Gastric bypass, cholecystectomy, antireflux surgery) Normal weight without type 2 diabetes BMI 1825 Obese without type 2 diabetes BMI>35 Obese with type 2 diabetes BMI>35 under 18 years open surgery pregnancy BMI >27<35
